features.title: Localised for UK users
features.details: Users in the UK should now see tag colours instead of tag colors!

features.title: Grouped Learning Outcomes
features.details: In the summary view, learning outcomes are now grouped by lesson

features.title: iPad Workflow Improvements
features.details: On iPad, you will no longer see a blank screen when opening, allowing you to get to work even quicker!

features.title: Smaller Editing Buttons
features.details: The new buttons for editing were overwhelmingly big on smaller devices.

features.title: Export and Import Lessons
features.details: Export lessons, learning outcomes, and resources as a .classesdoc file.  Share with others or create a backup from settings

features.title: Batch Edit Lessons
features.details: New action buttons for applying actions such as delete and share to multiple lessons at once

features.title: Scroll to Next Lesson
features.details: A new button allows you to quickly jump to your next lesson in the list!

features.title: New Icons for PBL and CBL
features.details: Changed the icons of Problem Based Learning and Case Based Learning lessons to make them less similar

features.title: New Color
features.details: Changed the blue background color to make it look less washed out

features.title: Fixed UK English Localisation
features.details: Fixed an issue in the previous version where this was not appearing.  Users in the UK should now see tag colours instead of tag colors!

features.title: New iPad Toolbar Buttons
features.details: Buttons for editing the displayed lesson are no longer in a menu, maximising space and reducing two taps to one.

features.title: Now Available on Mac!
features.details:
Classes is now available on Mac.  It features a new interface, designed to feel right in-place with macOS Big Sur.  It supports advanced Mac features such as multiple windows, keyboard shortcuts and more, allowing you to organise lessons with ease.
All of your lessons will automatically sync between devices via iCloud.
Download for free on the Mac App Store.

features.title: New Lesson Details and Summary Design
features.details: Lesson details now appear in a modern, colourful design.  Improvements in contrast, spacing, and depth make it much easier to view and interact with your content.  This has been brought over to Summary view as well.

features.title: Learning Outcome Filter
features.details: Filter learning outcomes by type and tag.  This lets you browse or use the Outcome Randomiser for specific outcomes only

features.title: Tag Icons in Lessons List
features.details: When browsing lessons in a list, small icons will show its tags.  This can help you find specific lessons at a glance, without opening and closing each one indiviually.

features.title: Improvements to Exporting / Importing .classesdoc files
features.details: View which lessons are contained in the file before importing, and selectively import only the lessons you choose.  Adds a new option to save generated docs to files.

features.title: New User Experience
features.details: The user interface has been streamlined and simplified.  On iPhone, the Tab View has been removed to avoid duplicate function.  The Summary and Learning Outcome modes have been integrated to the lesson list, giving them more customisation and flexibility based on the current list.

features.title: iPad Layout Optimisation
features.details: The app layout has been optimised for iPad with a new three-column layout to maximise space available on the larger display.  On smaller iPads, you can view the list of lessons and lesson details at the same time, and change the current list with a tap or swipe.  On larger iPads, you can view all three columns at once!

features.title: New List Filters
features.details: Custom filters allow you to filter each lesson list further than a single tag or lesson type.  Choose whether to view only watched or unwatched lessons, and specify multiple tags and lesson types to include and exclude.

features.title: New Smart Lists
features.details: Today’s Lessons, Unwatched Lessons, and Lessons with Unwritten ILOs appear as their own category in the main view.  This is a replacement and upgrade to the Summary view, which allows you to view and edit these lessons more easily than before.

features.title: More Customisable Learning Outcome Randomiser
features.details: As well as being integrated into each lesson list, the outcome randomiser adds options for shuffling and only showing completed outcomes.

features.title: Mark All Learning Outcomes as Written/Unwritten
features.details: New options for marking all outcomes of a lesson as written or unwritten.  Hold down or right-click on a lesson to access.

features.title: Bug Fixes
features.details:
Fixed bug where the outcome randomiser would not show any learning outcomes if none in the selection had been marked as written.

Fixed incorrect colour of the lesson date on iPad.

features.title: Improved Context Menu
features.details: Improved the layout of the context menu.  Access by holding down/right-clicking on a lesson.

features.title: Bug Fixes
features.details:
Improved alphabetical ordering of tags with numbers in their name, so that “10” does not appear between “1” and “2”.

Fixed a bug where the new “Mark Outcomes as Written/Unwritten” action would not work.

features.title: Edit Tag Improvements
features.details: A new button in the iPad toolbar allows you to quickly edit tags, without having to edit the full lesson.

features.title: Color Improvements
features.details: Now featuring a more colorful sidebar, and minor adjustments to some colors throughout the app.

features.title: Bug Fixes
features.details: Improved tag sorting introduced in 1.4.2 is now used in the filter lessons view.

features.title: New Outcome Progress Chart
features.details: A new icon shows the proportion of learning outcomes written up

features.title: Icon Updates
features.details:
Changed the icon for editing lessons to make its purpose more clear.
The filter icon is now filled to show if a filter is active.

features.title: Bug Fixes
features.details: Learning outcomes are correctly sorted by name in the outcome randomiser.

features.title: Apple Watch App
features.details: Classes is now on Apple Watch.  Quickly view your lessons, mark them as completed and mark outcomes as achieved at a glance.

features.title: Updated User Experience
features.details: New text and images throughout the app to give help, tips, and a more friendly appearance.  There is a new tutorial for new users, which can be found in Settings.

features.title: Improved Toolbar
features.details: Toolbar for editing lessons uses the familiar iOS appearance and offers more functionality, e.g. scrolling to different parts of the list and editing learning outcomes for multiple lessons at once.

features.title: Help
features.details: A new help link in the Settings page takes you to our website where you can find more information about how to use the app.

features.title: Other Improvements
features.details: Changed terminology from "watched" to "completed" and from "written" to "achieved" to be better accommodating to different courses and study styles.  Minor improvements to the layout of learning outcomes.
